Data Structures

class  ServiceThread
 Class ServiceThread is used to implement services, i.e. tasks which perform permanent background activity like network services. A service thread does not need any graphical user interface but needs to run as an own thread. It only always awakes from idle when it receives a message or when a timer expires. To handle the message overwrite method OnMessage(). For an automated start-up and shut-down of the service thread use class ServiceThreadStarter. More...
